ðŸ“– Summary: Arch-Cleaner is a bash script designed to automate routine maintenance and cleanup tasks on Arch Linux systems. It offers features such as system updates, removal of orphaned packages, cleaning the Pacman cache and journal logs, and temporary file removal. The script also includes options for emptying the trash and rebooting the system after cleanup.
